items.creator: tech@thehiveworks.com
items.title: Awkward Zombie - Stir the Posse
items.author: tech@thehiveworks.com
items.content:
New comic!
Today's News:

With complete sincerity: all I wanted to do in this game was run around in the woods and have my own Weirdo Adventures, and the only incentive to do cowboy crimes with my terrible friends was to unlock whatever new fishing lure was locked behind that plot progression.
items.contentSnippet:
New comic!Today's News:
With complete sincerity: all I wanted to do in this game was run around in the woods and have my own Weirdo Adventures, and the only incentive to do cowboy crimes with my terrible friends was to unlock whatever new fishing lure was locked behind that plot progression.

items.title: Awkward Zombie - Snuggle Smuggle
items.author: tech@thehiveworks.com
items.content:
New comic!
Today's News:

Sure, you laugh, but you don't know fear until you've seen a cat standing on his hind legs and pointing a knife at you.
items.contentSnippet:
New comic!Today's News:

items.title: Awkward Zombie - Reach for the Sky
items.author: tech@thehiveworks.com
items.content:
New comic!
Today's News:

Sometimes your special cool guy gun is too far away because you are holding too many boxes of action figures. Really makes you think.

items.creator: tech@thehiveworks.com
items.title: Awkward Zombie - Paired to Death
items.author: tech@thehiveworks.com
items.content:
New comic!
Today's News:

I am one of those people who got to know Joker through Super Smash Bros before Persona, so I was expecting ArsÃ¨ne to be my cool friend who would stick by me through thick and thin. Then, two hours into Persona 5, I cut his head off and transmuted him into a gross goblin. J-just like all the life lessons about friendship I learned from Pokemon, right?
items.contentSnippet:
New comic!Today's News:
I am one of those people who got to know Joker through Super Smash Bros before Persona, so I was expecting ArsÃ¨ne to be my cool friend who would stick by me through thick and thin. Then, two hours into Persona 5, I cut his head off and transmuted him into a gross goblin. J-just like all the life lessons about friendship I learned from Pokemon, right?

New comic!
Today's News:

items.creator: tech@thehiveworks.com
items.title: Awkward Zombie - Disagree to Agree
items.author: tech@thehiveworks.com
items.content:
New comic!
Today's News:

The preppers of Death Stranding have been cooped up inside for so long that they just want someone to talk to, even if it means participating in local government.


This is in no way topical.

items.title: Awkward Zombie - Skin in the Game
items.author: tech@thehiveworks.com
items.content:
New comic!
Today's News:

Honestly, I probably drew Sam's hood more protective than it actually is. He's just really, really banking on the idea that he will never need to look up.
